abstract: Texas Atty Gen Ken Paxton calls on State Supreme Court to revoke marriage license issued to two women, citing decade-old state ban on same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Ken Paxton asked the state’s Supreme Court on Friday to revoke a marriage license issued to two women, saying that the move violated a decade-old state ban against same-sex marriage.

headline.main: Texas: Revocation of Marriage License Is Sought
headline.print_headline: Texas: Revocation of Marriage License Is Sought

snippet: Attorney General Ken Paxton asked the state’s Supreme Court on Friday to revoke a marriage license issued to two women, saying that the move violated a decade-old state ban against same-sex marriage.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
